channel.title: Page Configuration on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Page Configuration on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Design - Theme & Logo - Page Configuration - Disable / Enable desktop and mobile
item.description: BO - Design - Theme & Logo - Page Configuration - Disable / Enable desktop and mobile Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Improve > Design > Theme & Logo Theme & Logo page is displayed correctly Click on “Pages Configuration” Pages Configuration page is displayed correctly On Menu > Main menu > click to Disable mobile Notice!

item.title: BO - Design - Theme & Logo - Page Configuration - Reset
item.description: BO - Design - Theme & Logo - Page Configuration - Reset Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Improve > Design > Theme & Logo Theme & Logo page is displayed correctly Click on “Pages Configuration” Pages Configuration page is displayed correctly On Menu > Main menu > Reset A modale should appear : Reset module? You are about to reset Main menu

item.title: BO - Design - Theme & Logo - Page Configuration - Uninstall
item.description: BO - Design - Theme & Logo - Page Configuration - Uninstall Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Improve > Design > Theme & Logo Theme & Logo page is displayed correctly Click on “Pages Configuration” Pages Configuration page is displayed correctly On Footer > Link List > Uninstall A modale should appear : h4. Uninstall module? You are about to uninstall Link List
